column4: Tesla burns cash  loses more than $4 000 on every car sold
column5: The Silicon Valley automaker is losing more than $4 000 on every Model S electric sedan it sells  using its reckoning of operating losses  and it burned $359 million in cash last quarter in a bull market for luxury vehicles. Chief Executive Elon Musk said he's considering options to raise more capital  and didn't rule out selling more stock. | Video

column5: MEXICO CITY  Aug 10 A new partnership between U.S.-based power company AES Corp and Mexico's Grupo Bal launched on Monday will invest up to $2.5 billion over the next five years mostly in Mexico's newly opened power sector  a top AES executive said in an interview.

column4: Blackstone seeks sale of facility management firm GCA: sources
column5: Blackstone Group LP  is exploring the sale of GCA Services Group Inc  in a deal that could value the provider of janitors and cleaners to schools and businesses at more than $1 billion  including debt  according to people familiar with the matter.

column5: Aug 10 Blackstone Group LP is exploring the sale of GCA Services Group Inc  in a deal that could value the provider of janitors and cleaners to schools and businesses at more than $1 billion  including debt  according to people familiar with the matter.

column4: Twitter interim CEO Dorsey buys more shares in show of faith
column5: Twitter Inc  interim Chief Executive Jack Dorsey joined other insiders in buying more shares in the company in a show of confidence in the stock  which traded at a record-low last week.

column4: Twitter signs multi-year deal with NFL
column5: The National Football League said it signed a multi-year partnership with microblogging site Twitter Inc  to deliver video and other content to NFL fans on a daily basis.

column4: Ultrapar keen to acquire some Petrobras gas assets  paper says
column5: SAO PAULO  Aug 10 Ultrapar Participações SA   which owns Brazil's largest natural gas distribution company  is interested in acquiring some assets from state-controlled Petróleo Brasileiro SA that could be listed as early as this year  O Estado de S. Paulo newspaper reported on Monday.

column4: Under Armour to become title partner for NBA Draft Combine
column5: Under Armour Inc said it would be the title partner of the National Basketball Association (NBA) Draft Combine as the No. 2 U.S. sportswear maker expands its relationship with the league.

column4: BRIEF-Capita to sell National Dental Plan to Unum Group for 31.7 mln stg
column5: * Has agreed sale of National Dental Plan (NDP) to Unum Group for a cash consideration of 31.7 million stg on a cash free  debt free basis  Source text for Eikon:  Further company coverage: [CPI.L UNM.N]

column4: Top iron ore exporter Goa resumes output after three years
column5: NEW DELHI India's top iron ore exporting state of Goa resumed production on Monday after nearly three years and could hit its court-set annual limit of 20 million tonnes this fiscal year itself  its mines director told Reuters.

column4: India's Vedanta set to produce 5.5 mln T iron ore after restarting operations
column5: NEW DELHI  Aug 10 Vedanta Ltd  India's biggest private miner  expects to produce 5.5 million tonnes of iron ore this fiscal year to March after restarting operations on Monday after a gap of almost three years  a senior company executive told Reuters.
